name: Bounce Craze
description:
Bounce Craze was made for and during the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam.

The idea of the game was based on roguelikes, incremental or 'clicker' games, and a mobile game called Monster Strike. You gather crystals which would act as currency  but also serve to power up your attacks and to heal your wounds. 

The ideal version of this game would include items you could purchase that earn you crystals even when you aren't playing the game. 

Even with this prototype the first level features random generation that forces you to manage your limited resources and choose whether to dodge or attack enemies.
